author: JamesWTruher
body:
@TravisEz13 
another attempt to find a way to get daily builds working in Travis-CI. This further reduces output from progress, and removes `-Quiet` so we will get pester test output (which will hopefully keep Travis-CI from killing our run due to "inactivity"

comments.author: TravisEz13
comments.body: Discussed offline and we need to test in a private for before accepting

title: Jameswtruher/travisdaily3
